ComicInfo.Title: The High Soft Lisp [Part Five of Six]; Julio's Day [Part 8]; The Little Stunt Boy in The Art of the Deal; Maggie [Part 8]; She's Only Crying; Modern Marzipan: 1957 (Things to Know number 12) - Comprachico's Rituals
ComicInfo.Summary:
What the hell is going on in Izzy's house? Maggie, Hopey, Doyle, and other recurring characters share reminiscences about the strange history of their strange friend's long-time residence in this issue's "Maggie" installment by Jaime Hernandez. Over in Beto-land, in "The High Soft Lisp," Fritz's happy marriage begins to unravel, and an over-the-top way to save it turns out to be the biggest mistake yet. And what might that be, you ask? Deranged sex! What else? Plus, in "Julio's Day," the rain won't let up, forcing Julio and his brother to find work out of town, and "Me for the Unknown" begins charging towards its climactic finale next issue. All this, plus more surprises.
Story Titles"She's Only Crying" by Beto"Maggie" by Jaime"The Little Stunt Boy""Julio's Day""The Soft High Lisp" by Beto
